newsitem.title: CHINA: LG Group opens joint venture in China.
newsitem.headline: LG Group opens joint venture in China.

text.p: South Korea's LG Group has formally opened its LG Electronics (Tianjin) Appliance Co Ltd joint venture in the northern city of Tianjin, the Xinhua news agency said.
LG Electronics (Tianjin) is a $79 million venture between LG Group's Lucky-Goldstar Co and China's Tianjin Light Industry Corp, Xinhua said. No further details were available.
An LG group official in Beijing, speaking by telephone on Wednesday, repeated an earlier statement made in May by the group that it plans to invest $10 billion in China before the year 2005.
The group planned to invest in electronics, real estate, telecommunications, oil refining, retail and finance, the official said. He declined to give further details.
